title: News24.com | Covid-19 wrap: China rejects calls for probe, Brexit talks resume and clashes in Niger over curfew
description: Clashes have erupted in Niamey, the capital of the Sahel nation of Niger, over the government's anti-coronavirus curfew and a ban on prayer gatherings, according to local inhabitants.
content:
Keeping you up to date on the latest novel coronavirus
